job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: strongEmployee Applicant Privacy NoticebrbrstrongstronguWho We ArebrbrustrongWelcoming collaborative and having the opportunity to make an impact  is how our employees describe working here Galileo is a financial technology company that provides innovative and revolutionary software products and services that power some of the worlds largest Fintechs We are the only payments innovator that applies tech and engineering capabilities to empower Fintechs and financial institutions to unleash their full creativity to achieve their most inspired goals Galileo leads its industry with superior fraud detection security decisionmaking analytics and regulatory compliance functionality combined with customized responsive and flexible programs to accelerate the success of all payments companies and solve tomorrows payments challenges today We hire energetic and creative employees while providing them the opportunity to excel in their careers and make a difference for our clients Learn more about us and why we work here at httpswwwgalileoftcomworkingatgalileobrbrstrongThe rolebrbrstrongWe are looking for eager software engineers early in their career who are excited to dive into engineering at Galileo and help us build payment systems at scale Galileo removes the complexities of payments to enable companies to focus on providing their customers with seamless card issuing and peerless digital banking experiences On our team you will be in the middle of it all  implementing new functionality squashing bugs testing and deploying monitoring and supporting mission critical systems working on hyper scale modern payment technology and continually growing as an engineer Youll face and solve a wide range of challenges technical product domain and operational shaping your personal growth and career along the waybrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliBe an integral part the development and testing of our systems and servicesliliHelp translate product requirements into user stories and technical solutionsliliImplement and support highly available and scalable services in a production environment that impacts millions of individualsliliGenerate ideas for process improvement initiatives and new technologiesliliCommunicate and collaborate with project leads product managers and other software developersbrliulstronguWhat Youll NeedbrustrongulliBachelors Degree in Computer Science or related fieldlili1 years of experience or demonstrable equivalent including school projects or internshipsliliDemonstrable programming experience ideally on a modern stack Internships and relevant school experience will be consideredliliWillingness to roll up your sleeves collaborate with others and get stuff doneliliSome exposure to database and cloud technologiesliliStrong problemsolving skillsbrliulstronguWhy Youll Love Working HerebrustrongulliCompetitive salary packages and bonusesliliComprehensive medical dental vision and life insurance benefitsliliGenerous vacation and holidaysliliPaid parental leave for eligible employeeslili401k and education on retirement planningliliTuition reimbursement on approved programsliliMonthly contribution up to 200 to help you pay off your student loansliliGreat health amp wellbeing benefits including telehealth parental support subsidized gym programliliFully stocked
